Peter Schweizer will discuss his groundbreaking bestselling books from “Throw Them All Out” to “Extortion” to “Clinton Cash.”

Legendary pollster Pat Caddell will discuss Wisconsin and the road to the GOP convention in Cleveland for Trump and Cruz.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on Sirius XM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News executive chairman Stephen K. Bannon will be joined in studio by bestselling author Peter Schweizer.

Sirius XM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Frank Gaffney, President of the Center for Security Policy and Cruz campaign foreign policy advisor, will discuss the threat of Islamic terror at the heart of Europe.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
